attributes.action: Legalize or decriminalise cannabis for medical use
attributes.additional_details: Medicinal use of canmabis is not harmfull and the powers that be are only keeping this stupid law just to protect big pharmaceutical companies who profit from selling poisoning alternatives cannabis oil kills cancer cells is better than most antidepressants relieves pain suppresses ms and is now proven to be the best treatment for epilepsy is wrong that these patients cannot grow there own as an alternative to the medicines that only serve to profit big pharma companies it must end its wrong
attributes.background: I suffered a servere spinal injury 7 years ago and after been addicted to meds such as tramadol and other horrible opiates I found cannabis to be the only alternative that works unfortunately I have been robbed arrested and beaten up repeatedly in my efforts to obtain my medication
